footer.headline: Learn, build, and share every day.
footer.description: A complete ecosystem with mentoring, forums, and on-demand modules to boost your tech career.

bottom.community: Built by the Nebula community to power your growth.

access.lockedDescription: The {{page}} page is not included in your current plan.

home.banner.subtitle: Welcome to
home.banner.title: NEBULA
home.banner.description: Have you ever looked at the night sky and wondered about the mysteries of the cosmos? At NEBULA, we are passionate about astronomy and astrophysics, and our mission is to transform that curiosity into deep knowledge.
home.about.title: Who we are
home.about.mission: Our mission: to teach astronomy and astrophysics comprehensively, guiding students from the most basic to the most advanced level. Our purpose is to prepare teenagers fresh out of high school and adults of all ages to master knowledge of the universe, offering a real path to pursue outstanding careers in various fields of physics and space science.
home.about.vision: Our vision: to be recognized nationally and internationally as the most complete, accessible and inspiring astronomy and astrophysics course, present both online and in educational institutions. We want to be the starting point for great scientific careers, forming students who stand out in universities, research centers and space agencies around the world.
home.about.values: Our values: we believe in quality education, accessible to everyone, regardless of age or background. We value love for science, curiosity, respect for diversity and commitment to each student in their learning journey. Our content is based on reliable and updated sources, always with the goal of transforming lives through knowledge.
home.content.title: Our exclusive content
home.content.cards.videoLessons.title: Video lessons
home.content.cards.videoLessons.descript: Recorded lessons with didactic explanations and commented exercises to guide you from basic to advanced in astronomy and astrophysics. Watch at your own pace, as many times as you want.
home.content.cards.pdfs.title: PDF and tasks
home.content.cards.pdfs.description: PDF content for those who prefer to learn by reading, plus structured tasks that are part of the learning schedule and reinforce each topic studied.
home.content.cards.qa.title: Questions and answers
home.content.cards.qa.description: Have access to an exclusive forum with other students and count on direct support from teachers to clear doubts and deepen your studies.
home.content.cards.signup.title: Register now
home.content.cards.signup.description: Register for free and get immediate access to introductory course lessons. Discover how easy and engaging it is to start your journey through the universe!
home.carousel.title: Free videos
home.carousel.videos.video1.title: What is astronomy?
home.carousel.videos.video2.title: How did everything begin?
home.carousel.videos.video3.title: Three-body problem
home.carousel.videos.video4.title: Interplanetary systems
home.carousel.videos.video5.title: General relativity
home.carousel.videos.video6.title: Schrödinger waves
home.carousel.videos.video7.title: Kepler's laws

modulesPage.invalidSubscription: The provided subscription is not valid.
modulesPage.lockedContent: This content is exclusive to the {{plan}} plan.

home.plans.title: Find the best plan for you
home.plans.description: After watching the video above and understanding how our courses work, you can now choose the best plan for you.
home.plans.tiers.orbit.name: Orbit
home.plans.tiers.orbit.description: For beginners, it covers basic physics and astronomy concepts, such as the Solar System and fundamental laws. Ideal for those starting their journey in the scientific universe.
home.plans.tiers.galaxy.name: Galaxy
home.plans.tiers.galaxy.description: Explores intermediate topics such as Newton's laws, stars, galaxies and introduction to relativity. Perfect for those who already know the basics and want to go deeper.
home.plans.tiers.universe.name: Universe
home.plans.tiers.universe.description: Advanced plan with content on quantum physics, black holes, dark energy and cosmology. Recommended for those seeking complete and in-depth training.

orbita.name: ORBIT
orbita.description: For those starting to explore astronomy.

galaxia.name: GALAXY

universo.description: Complete experience with every advanced feature and content.

pix.name: PIX
pix.description: Pay via QR Code or copy/paste key. As soon as PIX is confirmed (up to 24h), the chosen course is automatically unlocked and you receive confirmation by email.

credit.name: CREDIT CARD
credit.descriptionPrimary: Fill in the details below to process the payment securely. We use tokenized checkout and your access is released instantly.
credit.descriptionSecondary: Use your credit card to confirm the subscription immediately. All data is encrypted and never stored on the platform.

debit.name: DEBIT CARD
debit.description: Debit card payments require the data below. Confirmation happens a few minutes after your bank authenticates the purchase.

boleto.name: BOLETO
boleto.deadlinePrefix: The boleto must be paid within
boleto.deadlineSuffix: Access is released within up to two business days after bank confirmation.

placeholders.cardHolder: Name exactly as on the card
placeholders.fullName: Full name as on your ID
